english.segment1: Lord You're beautiful. Your face is all I seek. For when your eyes are on this child. Your grace abounds to me. (repeat)
english.segment2: I want to take your word/. And shine it all around. First help me just to live it Lord. And when I'm doing well/. Help me to never seek a crown. For my reward is giving glory to you
english.segment3: Lord please light the fire. That once burned bright and clear. Replace the lamp of my first love. That burns with holy fear
